name.description: The name or UUID for this Management Group, which needs to be unique across your tenant. A new UUID will be generated if not provided. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

group_id.description: The name or UUID for this Management Group, which needs to be unique across your tenant. A new UUID will be generated if not provided. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

display_name.description: A friendly name for this Management Group. If not specified, this'll be the same as the `name`.

parent_management_group_id.description: The ID of the Parent Management Group. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

subscription_ids.description: A list of Subscription GUIDs which should be assigned to the Management Group.

id.description: The ID of the Management Group.

create.description: Used when creating the Management Group.

update.description: Used when updating the Management Group.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Management Group.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Management Group.
